title: Cardinals fans should be cautiously optimistic (Football 05/23)
description:
Will Leitch of MLB and NY Mag joins Will Brinson to talk about the Arizona Cardinals season, what it means to have Josh Rosen on the roster, how expectations are looking with Steve Wilks replacing Bruce Arians, if Larry Fitzgerald is underrated, whether Will B should ever pick the Cards to win a title again and if Arizona can surpass its over/under of 5.5 games. Will B also takes a look at the Hunter Henry ACL injury for the Chargers and other NFL news.
